# Allow all bots to access important content
User-agent: *
Disallow:

# Block bots from accessing admin and private directories
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /temp/

# Block bots from accessing specific files
Disallow: /secret-page.html

# Block bots from accessing CSS and JS directories if they're not critical
Disallow: /css/
Disallow: /js/

# Allow Googlebot to access everything
User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow:

# Block all bots from accessing a specific folder
User-agent: *
Disallow: /no-bots/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://info.duett.bio/sitemap.xml
